p: Clinical evidence. Glycyrrhiza glabra preparations have been trialed clinically for respiratory disease (asthma). An RTC, involving 36 patients presenting chronic asthma, showed licorice in a dose of 3.5 mg/kg in 200 ml water, three times daily, was able to improve the pulmonary function’s parameter similarly to prednisolone (0.15 mg/kg) as a single daily dose ( Al-Jawad et al., 2012). Overall, the clinical evidence is High for asthma.
